title: Woman of Blood & Bone
description:
I was burned at the stake when I was fourteen...
I was drowned in a lake when I was twenty-four...At twenty-seven, I was stoned in a public square...Maxima Alcado has died a hundred times in a hundred different ways, usually at the hands of the humans she tries to save. But when this centuries-old Witch helps the wrong person, things go horribly wrong.Max might just die in a way that sticks.Permanently.
author: Annie Anderson
